p: In contrast to concurrent PbA co-infection, pre-Py17x (−4 dpi) + CHIKV co-infection suppressed early CHIKV replication in the tissue from 1–3 dpi and levels of joint footpad viral RNA on 2 dpi (Fig. 2d–f and Supplementary Movie 2). Despite this early phenotype, pre-Py17x (−4 dpi) + CHIKV co-infection led to elevated tissue viral load from 5–18 dpi in the co-infected mice compared to CHIKV-only mice (Fig. 2d, e and Supplementary Movie 2). Viral load within the joints of co-infected mice remained significantly higher until 40 dpi, and virus clearance was delayed from 40 dpi to 45 dpi (Fig. 2g).
